posts.post_title: T 206 Hall of Fame Portraits FS
posts.post_content:
I have the following nice HOF portraits for sale. 

T206 Young Portrait  Piedmont 150 SGC20 Stunning card pin hole at top otherwise beautiful w/ nice centering no creases  400.00

T206 Johnson Portrait SGC30  Piedmont 150 some minor creasing great color nice card for the grade   350.00

T206 Tinker Red Portrait SGC 50 Piedmont 350 great color, no creases, off center on reverse 175.00

T206 Evers Portrait Sweet Cap 150 SGC 30 Great color and registration glue stains on back NO creases  125.00

Scans available for all cards, prices delivered plus insurance.

Please e-mail me at [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]

Thanks for looking
Scan request email sent on all cards. Thanks!
Tinker and Johnson sold, Young and Evers still available..
